players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "This is terrible! Bob's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious? I'm looking at everyone equally right now."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Diana: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Bob? That seems like a waste of a night one investigation."

Charlie: "Alice, that's a very convenient claim to make when you can't be proven wrong. If you were really the detective, you'd know revealing yourself this early makes you an easy target. Diana makes a good point too - why would you investigate me instead of Bob?..."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie and he is mafia. Diana, investigating Charlie wasn't a waste - it caught the killer. Vote Charlie now."
Diana: "Alice, if you're truly the detective, why would you investigate Charlie when Bob was the obvious night kill target? This feels like a setup. I'm voting Alice."
